verbs.description: while [ARGM-LOC: at the polls] [V: wait] [ARG2: for the waving american flag] [ARG1: some] voters leave the voting machine before hitting the cast ballot button one final time and that means their vote does n't get counted it not a massive problem in harris county but there an easy way to avoid it houston administrator sonya aston leonora friend harris county texas harris county
